text: books , notebooks , pens and a fully loaded , semi-automatic gun . the first few items are standard classroom material , but not the last -- which is why a 15-year-old boy at toronto 's jarvis collegiate institute ended up under arrest , according to police . officers went into the teenager 's classroom around 1:15 p.m. friday and arrested him on charges that included unauthorized possession of a firearm , careless storage of ammunition and carrying a concealed weapons . he is set to appear in court at toronto 's old city hall on saturday morning , police said . according to its website , jarvis collegiate institute is the oldest secondary school in toronto , having been founded in 1807 . cnn 's greg botelho and kevin conlon contributed to this report .
summary: a 15-year-old boy is arrested at toronto 's jarvis collegiate institute .   he had a loaded , semi-automatic gun with him in his classroom , police say .
